name: @tinycloudlabs/sdk-rs
description: TinyCloud WASM build source - builds web-sdk-wasm and node-sdk-wasm
author: TinyCloud, Inc.

scripts.build: bun run build:wasm:web && bun run build:wasm:node
scripts.build:wasm:web: bash -c 'source ../../scripts/setup.sh && wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir web-sdk-wasm --manifest-path Cargo.toml --features browser'
scripts.build:wasm:node: bash -c 'source ../../scripts/setup.sh && wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir node-sdk-wasm --manifest-path Cargo.toml --features nodejs'
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/web && bun run build && cd ../node && bun run build
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:packages
